item.description:
Hi All,

This will be our first ever cigar and Scotch or Brandy or Port Night at Cigar Masters!

Cigar Masters is known and respected worldwide throughout the cigar community. They are proud to educate the public on the long, beautiful tradition and the skillful artistry of fine, hand-rolled cigars.

PHILOSOPHY

Cigar Masters focuses around the culture, lifestyle and tradition of Cigars. Cigar Masters offers the finest cigar selections available and most exclusive brands. Exquisite accessories and unsurpassed service give clients a most satisfying shopping experience. Cigar Masters is constantly educating its staff and consumers, keeping up to date on the most sought after cigars and accessories.

While picking out your favorite cigar they invite you to relax with a glass of wine, a beautiful vintage port or refreshing ale. Lounge in a rich leather chair, reflect, relax or participate in the fine art of conversation. We do not advertise and appreciate the wonderful patrons who refer us to their friends. So, whatever brings you in, Cigar Masters will make your experience an unforgettable one, which accounts for our kindest acceptance worldwide.

HISTORY

Cigar Masters was created and founded by Brandon Salomon and first opened in May 1996. The original concept and business plan was to create a setting where fine cigars could be purchased and enjoyed in a comfortable environment. While attending Boston University (and enjoying many cigars), Brandon felt that the city of Boston was a perfect venue for creating this relaxed elegant environment.

The original location of Cigar Masters was on Newbury Street. At first, only coffee and non-alcoholic beverages were served, but within 6 months a beer and wine license was obtained. Soon after, Cigar Masters began receiving many accolades including: Bostonâ€™s Best, Top 10 in the Country by Cigar Aficionado and more.

I hope you'll join us out!

Michael
